-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Library for classification of media files.
--   
--   Library for classification of media files.
@package classify
@version 2012.10.23


-- | This module defines a parser for television media files commonly found
--   in filesharing communities. The internals of the parser are
--   non-deterministic and heuristics are used to select the interpretation
--   most likely to be correct.
module Data.Classify.Television
type Name = String
data Version
Version :: Int -> Int -> Version
season :: Version -> Int
episode :: Version -> Int
DateVersion :: Int -> Int -> Int -> Version
year :: Version -> Int
month :: Version -> Int
day :: Version -> Int
type Title = String
tryClassify :: [Name] -> String -> Maybe (Name, Version, Title)
classify :: [Name] -> String -> (Name, Version, Title)
